title: 🌍 Manifest of Unity and Humanity
intro1: Life as we know it is an illusion.
intro2: A world where people do not harmonize is built incorrectly.
visionTitle: 🌱 Our Vision: A World of Harmony
visionList:
• No money, no market, no companies.
  • No property, no profit, no competition.
  • No state, no borders, no nations.
  • No exploitation – neither of people, animals, nor nature.
  • No artificial separation between technology and spirituality, body and mind, human and animal.
  • A world where science and empathy go hand in hand.
  • Agnostic or atheistic – free from religious coercion, but full of humanity.
  • Open knowledge, free education, open source in technology and thinking.
valuesList:
• Common good for all.
  • Freedom through connectedness.
  • Education for awareness, not obedience.
  • Technology as a tool of liberation, not control.
  • Knowledge as a common good, not a commodity.
  • Science as a path to truth – without ideology.
demand1: We demand no government, we demand no party – we demand new thinking.
demand2:
Thinking that detaches from power, possession, and status.
A life that doesn't ask for profit, but for meaning.
A system that doesn't manage, but nourishes.
demandList:
• End wars, because no one is an enemy anymore.
  • Abolish trade, because no one needs to sell anything anymore.
  • Dissolve borders, because no one wants to be separated anymore.
  • End exploitation, because all lives are equally valuable.
  • Strengthen empathy as the basis of all actions.
  • Open technology that benefits everyone.
utopia1:
Just because it doesn't exist yet doesn't mean it's not possible.
All systems we consider "normal" today were once just ideas.
Our utopia is not an escape – it's a direction. A guide to a better, more human future.
utopia2:
We are one – humans, animals, nature, machines.
Only together will we find peace. Not in competition, but in connection.
quote:
The world we describe is not a dream.
It is a choice.
